name: Srinivasa Kondragunta
title: Senior Business Data System Analyst
summary: Total 16+ Years of IT experience in implementing BI Solutions. Sr. Business Data Analyst with 6+ years of experience in leveraging data-driven strategies to enhance workforce planning, employee engagement, and organizational effectiveness.
bio: Senior Business Data System Analyst with 16+ years of IT experience specializing in Business Intelligence solutions and workforce analytics.
Currently part of team implementing New Generative AI People Intelligence Agent (PIA), working on Business Analysis and Prompt Engineering with AI-powered HR platforms.
Extensive experience with Workday System integrations, OBIEE, ETL tools, and advanced analytics platforms including AWS, Tableau, and ThoughtSpot.
Passionate about fostering data-driven decision making and building scalable analytics solutions that drive organizational effectiveness.
highlights: 16+ years of experience in Business Intelligence and data analytics
6+ years specializing in workforce planning and employee engagement analytics
Expert in Generative AI, Prompt Engineering, and People Intelligence solutions
Extensive experience with AWS, Tableau, ThoughtSpot, Workday, and OBIEE
Led scaling of HR Analytics projects at Fortune 500 companies
Master's degree in Computer Science with multiple industry certifications
